argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | raltp.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | raltp.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | raltp.3 | |- C e. _V |
| 4 |  | raltp.4 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 5 |  | raltp.5 | |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) |
| 6 |  | raltp.6 | |- ( x = C -> ( ph <-> th ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_rextpg | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V /\ C e. _V ) -> ( E. x e. { A , B , C } ph <-> ( ps \/ ch \/ th ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_mp3an | |- ( E. x e. { A , B , C } ph <-> ( ps \/ ch \/ th ) ) |
